name: backlight_setValue
description: This function is used to set the screen brightness of a SmartThings device to a specific value.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the screen brightness.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.description: The specific value to set the screen brightness to.
